thread.title: Attend Fusion Dance Competition in Atlanta and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85

author: cbs8
title: Attend Fusion Dance Competition in Atlanta and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85
text:
Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 offers affordable lodging for the Fusion Dance Competition and Fall Convention in Atlanta on October 10, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, October 06, Dancers attending the Fusion National Dance Competition and Fall Convention will find affordable accommodations at the Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85. The event will be held on October 10 at the Georgia International Convention Center near Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport. Dancers may audition for scholarships, awards, and cash prizes. A dancer from the Junior, Teen, and Senior age divisions will be selected to be Fusion Apprentices during the 2016 Nationals.
"We are happy to offer convenient and affordable lodging to guests attending the Fusion National Dance Competition in Atlanta," comments Vincent Thomas, the new General Manager of the Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85. "Our Atlanta Airport hotel is located just 2.5 miles from the Georgia International Convention Center," explains Thomas.
The award winning Hampton Inn & Suites ATL Airport hotel North I-85 features comfortable guest rooms with free high speed Internet and Hampton Clean and Fresh Beds . Travelers will appreciate the convenience of an in-room microwave and mini refrigerator. Hampton's complimentary On the House Breakfast offers healthy hot and cold options. Guests with limited time may choose an On the Run Breakfast Bag on weekday mornings. Amenities at this Hartsfield hotel include a 24-hour business center, fitness room, and seasonal outdoor pool. Snacks and beverages may be purchased at the Pavilion Pantry Market. Real time flight information for Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport is displayed on the Flight Board in the lobby. Guests can take the hotel's complimentary shuttle transportation to the airport.
Current lodging specials include the Weekend Getaway Package with late checkout. AAA, senior, and military rates are available. HHonors members will earn points toward free hotel nights. The Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence.
For information about the Fusion National Dance Competition and Fall Convention, visit www.fusionndc.com . To book your stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85, call 404-767-9300 or visit www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.com .
About Hampton Inn & Ste Atlanta Airport North I-85
The Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport Hotel is just north of Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport and just southwest of downtown Atlanta. The hotel is two and a half miles from the Georgia International Convention Center, four miles from Atlanta Expo Center, and 15 miles from Six Flags Over Georgia. Other nearby attractions include the Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca-Cola , Underground Atlanta, CNN Center, Georgia Dome and Georgia World Congress Center--all less than 10 miles away from the hotel. The Atlanta Airport hotel also offers a broad range of services and amenities to make its guest's stay exceptional.
For more information visit: http://www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.COM
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
Cardinal Web Solutions
